SEARCH
Package org.basepom.mojo.dvc.mojo

Class DependencyVersionsListMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
org.basepom.mojo.dvc.AbstractDependencyVersionsMojo
org.basepom.mojo.dvc.mojo.DependencyVersionsListMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo, Context
@Mojo(name="list", requiresProject=true, threadSafe=true, requiresDependencyResolution=NONE, defaultPhase=VERIFY) public final class DependencyVersionsListMojo extends AbstractDependencyVersionsMojo
Resolves all dependencies of a project and lists all versions for any artifact and what version was chosen by the resolver.
Since:
2.0.0
